channel.title: Comments on: Qatar Airways and the IB Mathematics Exploration
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Dan Meyer
item.dc:creator: Dan Meyer
item.description:
"Having students be curators of their own 'interesting-stuff' collection now seems the most obvious way to get them started."
I'd like to know how this goes.
item.content:encoded:
“Having students be curators of their own ‘interesting-stuff’ collection now seems the most obvious way to get them started.”

I’d like to know how this goes.
